content: Nozzle 4-in-1 PC 2-22 ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Accessories for dust and water management > Accessories for pressure cleaners- - ### FEATURES:Features Spare parts – pressure washer lance, 4-in-1 nozzle, suction hose, water filter, and water connector as standard accessories to keep your PC 2-22 in working order Optional extras – detergent bottles and foldable buckets to help extend your PC 2-22 pressure cleaner’s range of use Applications Pressure cleaning chalk, wet mud, fresh slurry, and small equipment Light jobsite cleanups ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Nozzles For use with: PC 2-22 Technical Data | Accessory type | Nozzles | For use with | PC 2-22 ### ITEMS- 2395334 - Nozzle 4-in-1 PC 2-22 - Package Size 1 pc
